definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: id.;—abs. ´[[ח]] Jos 9:11 + 2 t., [[חֵדָה]] Ge 42:25 + 5t.;—provision for journey, march, Ge 42:25, Ge 45:21, Ex 12:39 (all E), Jos 1:11 (D), Jos 9:11 (JE), Ju Jdg 7:8 (text dub. cf. GFM), Jdg 20:10, 1Sa 22:10; supply of food Ps 78:25.—Ge 27:3 v. I. [[חַיִד]], sub [[חוד]].
